pol.name: Two Years
pol.desc: This period marks the first occurrence, in history, of the years 1616 through 1618.

econ.name: Deep Blue Beats Kasparov
econ.desc: IBM supercomputer Deep Blue beats Gary Kasparov, the current holder of the title of worlds' best chess player.

cult.name: 95 Theses
cult.desc: Martin Luther posts his 95 Theses against the sale of indulgences on the door of the Wittenburg Castle Church. The theses are widely distributed by intellectuals, eventually forming the base of the Protestant reformation.

cult.name: Mikey Way Born
cult.desc: Gerard Way is born on the seventh of may.
